Articles.Content:
Hi guys. I've been playing KSP for a while now, and only a little recently have I joined the forums. I would say i'm not bad at KSP, but I could still learn some new things, like gravity assists and definitely mod help. I have had some experience with making mods, but it is very limited. I barely know how to make a cfg file for a part!

Anyway, nice to be on the forums!

Hi CompletedPi. I have been playing KSP for over 4 years, and I would also say I'm not bad at KSP, but I could still learn some new things. 

Welcome to the forum.
Thanks for the reply! Sorry I'm a bit late though.  Looks like this is a pretty nice community. Its nice to see even giant moderators like you welcoming a newbie like me.
We moderators are forum members as well.

Hi before you start posting try checking out forum guidelines and rules for challenges,questions,tutorials and etc. It will really help you with doing your posts great and our forum clean! I hope you will do great on our forums,good luck!

 

P.s Woo i see you are a Global moderator now. Congratulations!
